Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset

nodes.body:
Hello! I noticed that you're targeting one of our servicing branches. Please consider updating the version.
<!-- Policy app identification https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=PullRequestIssueManagement. -->
@rainersigwald , can we merge it to vs17.9 ?
I don't think we should take any Roslyn or Arcade updates to 17.9 unless we discover that we need them to build or ship for servicing.
